metadata.title: CVE-2021-26119 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Smarty before 3.1.39 allows a Sandbox Escape because $smarty.template_object can be accessed in sandbox mode.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-26119` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

smarty3 - 3.1.39-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: smarty3 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.39-2').
